snippet: LONNER--Fred. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Fred Lonner, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Fred's beloved children, David, Janet, Sharon, Scott, Jonathan, Lauren, and Leora; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: LONNER--Fred. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Fred Lonner, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Fred's beloved children, David, Janet, Sharon, Scott, Jonathan, Lauren, and Leora; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
